sentences.sContent: the need for increased police vigilance
sentences.sCn: 警方加强警戒的必要性

remMethod.val: vig(生命) + il + ance → 有生命的， 活动的 → 不睡 → 警戒， 警惕

words.tran: 警惕的；警醒的；注意的；警戒的
义务警员；治安维持会成员

trans.tranOther: careful attention that you give to what is happening, so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity
